txt.en: The Men of Lebennin, descendants of Mountain-folk that dwelled in these lands before the coming of the Númenóreans, are a proud and strong-willed people who revere the Ship-kings of Gondor. Castamir the Usurper once dwelt in Lebennin, and his quest for power in Gondor almost tore his people apart. Lebennin bears the scars of the Kin-strife to this day, but with the coming of the Heirs of Castamir, old wounds have been rent anew.
